name: FIN-ISH
description:
"A  cute puzzle game that bites and doesn't let go."

"Fin-ish" is a connect-the-lines-type puzzle game with an actual twist; use whirlpools to reach your destination!

In "Fin-ish", your goal is to bring each shark to their respective finish without having any accidents on the way. You avoid these accidents by placing the right whirlpools on the right locations, allowing the sharks to twist, turn and ride the tide on their way to victory.

Take your chance and test the waters!

Install instructions
  • Download the zip file below.
  • Extract the zip to a (desired) folder.
  • Open the Fin-ish.exe file and click "play".
  • Have fun puzzling!
